Title: 2B Fine Wavy - Thumbs Up
Review: This Is my first CGM  product and I loved it. I have compared it to As I Am cowash and this one gives me better results.I use this as cowash or after I use moptop low poo cleanser. I‚Äôve seen my waves actually clump and not look flat. Smells great, not strong and lingering.Only con, not enough product. Finished bottle in a month (cowashed about 3xs a week)But will consider buying it again if no other product compares.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: FOR CURLY GIRLS, IT'S ALL ABOUT THE PRODUCT!
Review: With naturally curly hair, IT'S ALL ABOUT THE PRODUCT, and you CAN'T GO WRONG WITH MOPTOP!! I love everything I've used from them (& love 'em best whenever I've stuck with using THEIR haircare AND cocktailed their stylers.) Hands down this is my favorite product they make, and it's perfect when combined with their medium hold natural gel. Love, love, LOVE their performance ...and also their clean, citrusy, LOVELY SCENT! They even have GREAT HOW-TO VIDEOS on their website on hair care & styling ...done by CURLY GIRLS FOR CURLY GIRLS! üíú‚ù§üß°

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Fantastic product for adding "oomph" to natural curls and waves
Review: I love this product. I bought a tub of it back in September 2018 and I just finally ran out in May 2019. Coming on here to order more made me realize I should leave a review! A little bit of this goes a long way and you really don't need to use more than a nickel to quarter size amount depending on how much hair you have. Too much will actually cause you to end up with flakes so definitely start cautiously until you figure your perfect amount out. The photo I attached has the wash day before I received this product not using any curl activators on the left and then the wash adding this product into my line-up on the right. I think it's pretty obvious that it works!

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: CRUNCH CITY
Review: I don‚Äôt know if I did something wrong or what but after reading all the great reviews I was super excited to try this. Firstly, it came with the seal half on half off. Secondly, it made my hair crunchier than any other product I have ever used, YUCK!!! I was so self consious of my hair all day I ended up putting it in a messy bun (on a wash day, ugh!). I will maybe try again and use less (even though I don‚Äôt feel like I used that much??) and update if it‚Äôs better next time but so far, bad impression :(

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Favorite conditioner ever!
Review: I love this conditioner. I have super thick coarse hair and I generally use a handful of conditioner.  Not with this though! I need about 2 quarters worth and it's plenty! The slip is amazing. It makes my hair detangle almost instantly. I love the smell too. It doesn't linger if you're worried about that.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: I used this product alone and it worked fine. It does leave a crunchy cast which is ...
Review: I need to use this more to get more consistent results since I have never used it before  this purchase and this is a new purchase. I used this product alone and it worked fine. It does leave a crunchy cast which is good for wavy/curly girls to maintain a curl pattern. I scrunch it out later if I air dry or even after I diffuse. I have never used a hair custard before. A little goes a looong way which is good for the price. It feels like the slim I used to play with as a little girl, and the smell is nice and citrusy. It is up in the air if I will repurchase it and if so, it won't be for a long time because the tub is large.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Jury is still out...
Review: From other reviews, I knew it was not a heavy hold product. I did think it would be more of a "custard" texture as opposed to a thin gel texture. Just began using it, not sure if I will order again. I have short, thin, loose curly hair.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Perfect for 3a-c hair with Curly Girl method
Review: Been using this gel for a couple of years straight, in about a 3:1 ratio with leave-in conditioner, plus a few drops jojoba oil. Fantastic shine and texture, light, bouncy, low buildup. Scent is lovely. Hope they make this product forever. I can‚Äôt vouch for other curl types, but this is ideal for type 3!

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Glad I Purchased This!
Review: I have low porosity, fine, 2c/3a hair. I had been using DevaCurl B'Leave In and Wavemaker but wanted something with more hold. Mop Top was it! I will say this,  try Mop Top alone before mixing with other products. I was putting MT over my B'Leave In and the results were good but not great. I used it alone and BAM! I had to die for curls. What works for me is to coat my hair, scrunch and plop for 30 minutes and then diffuse without touching my hair at high heat high speed until 80% dry, then go for the roots at medium heat/speed, then finish on the ends. WORTH THE WORK! I finally love my wavy/curly hair!

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: THE BEST, and only styler
Review: After you get rid of the gel cast THIS IS THE ONLY PRODUCT I USE AS A STYLER!!!! ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!! IT LEAVES SOFT TAMED VOLUMINOUS CUDLS OR WAVES!!! I AM IN LOVE I LIVE IN A PLACE THAT HAS SOME HUMIDITY AND I HAVE LIVED IN EXTREME DRY AREAS... THIS IS ESSENTIAL IN MY HAIR ROUTINE!

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Expensive and didn't do much..
Review: Such a disappointment. I didn't like the price first of all. I thought for this price. I would be able to condense my hair products. Nope. To no avail. Made my hair look greasy. My waves fell super loose. Texture was just awful. Back to my old routine of leave in conditioner and got2be gel. (Black or yellow bottle) this routine is cheaper too.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: SMELLY
Review: I usually use a combination of Ouidad gel and DevaCurl cream to get my curls looking their best. Amazon was sold out of my usual gel last time, so I ordered this instead. It does an okay job holding curls together (similar to other nice gels I've tried) and only causes a moderate amount of "crispiness" in areas where you apply too much. The thing that I can't stand about this gel is the horrible smell! It smells like chemicals to me. I even had my boyfriend comment on the weird smell when my hair was wet. Trying to make myself use at least half of the container, but can't wait to throw this stuff out.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Best conditioner I‚Äôve tried!
Review: I‚Äôve tried so many different hair products during the last year of embracing my natural waves, but I keep coming back to the Mop Top Daily Conditioner. I have fine, low-medium density, high porosity, 2C waves. The conditioner is light weight, but moisturizes like a heavy deep conditioner. And it has GREAT slip. My hair is incredibly tangly, and almost impossible to finger detangle when wet. This is the only conditioner I‚Äôve tried that allows me to finger detangle without feeling like I‚Äôm ripping my hair out. My hair loves this product!

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Hair is void of moisture and feels like straw after using. Waste of money.
Review: I have fine curly hair, ringlets. I used this shampoo combined with the Moptop Leave in conditioner (which didn't condition) and then the Moptop Curly Custard, and my hair feels like straw, is ridiculously frizzy, and was harmed by these products. The curly custard is the only one that gave ANY moisture. The leave-in conditioner, was worse than the shampoo. Don't waste your money on these products, they hurt my hair.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Strong, defined hold
Review: I have fine permed hair and I've been struggling to find products that will enhance and hold my curls without weighing them down. A lot of products for curly hair are too heavy for me. Today was the first day I've used this curly hair custard and I am IMPRESSED. It creates a really strong cast, but once I scrunched out the crunch my curls were soft and defined unlike anything I've experienced before. Since this is the first time using it and I'm only about 2 hours into my day, I will hold off on official judgment until the end of the day, but so far this is my first holy grail product.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Nice formula, not great for fine hair
Review: I liked the formula and scent of this cowash, but unfortunately cowashing in general doesn't work with my fine, wavy/curly hair. My scalp is too greasy and all co-washes leave me with oily, weighed down curls. Instead I use Mop Tops gentle shampoo and am very happy with that...I use it every other day and it is not drying for either my scalp or my hair.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Good hold, tricky to use
Review: Pros: great hold, no allergy issues, easy to apply, plays well with other products, good ingredientsCons: tricky to use and can be drying and crunchy I‚Äôd not used exactly the right way. I brush products through my curls and this is such hardcore hold, that I had to finger curl my hair all over again after brushing because it was stick straight.Bottom line: Give it chance Apply on soaking wet hair. Apply adequate moisture underneath and plan on some crunchiness.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Excellent curl enhancer
Review: This custard is the best product I have found to enhance my 2C/3A curls.  It's not quite a defining gel,  but a product that will "encourage" waves into curls.The best way to use it is right after washing your hair, scrunching upwards.  The custard alone won't prevent frizz.  You still need to use gel.  I see some reviews that complain about a white residue, if you get that,  you're applying too much custard.I love the citrusy scent and how shiny my hair looks when it dries.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Very Good Product
Review: I've used this product for awhile, but stopped because I found something that worked better for my hair. However, I cut my hair very short and dyed it bright blue, and switched back to this because my other shampoo was stripping the color from my hair. This does not take out the color, and leaves my hair very soft.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: My Curls Are Back!
Review: This product is amazing. My hair had lost some of its shine and curl. I use this product daily along with the Curl Custard and my hair is soft, shiny and, best of all, my curls are defined and beautiful. My hair has been very easy to style and I'm getting a lot of compliments on it lately. I also love the scent. I just apply the product to wet hair, massage in and then rinse after I've finished washing my face and body. This product is great for any person with curly hair! Highly recommend!!

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Wish for a return
Review: So think of hold gel and hair spray. That's what my hair felt like. Had no bounce. Also, to make matters worse my hair had millions of little white fuzz in it from this product. As if you took hair spray and let it sit in your hair and it just looked so bad.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: This is NOT for fine curls
Review: Based on everything I've heard, this is a great gel for most curly hair types. However it is NOT great for fine curls. I've been looking everywhere for a good gel for fine curls, and this did say that it was in the description, but it isn't. It left my hair sticky and stringy and with frizz and fly-aways for days. Also, no matter how little I used, there was no scrunching out the crunch. It just stayed crunchy even after diffusing. I'm sure it works well for other hair types, but not fine hair.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Soft, clumpy curls
Review: Following the Curly Girl method, this makes my curls look soft and in big clumps with the perfect amount of hold. My curly hair is the result of strong medication for an autoimmune disease but has been naturally board straight my whole life. I turned my naturally curly sister on to this after watching YouTube videos and now she loves it as much as I do.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Perfect balance of cleansing and conditioning
Review: I love the MopTop products.  I have struggled for a long time with my curly hair trying to keep it from just looking frizzy. I use the co-wash daily. It is the perfect balance of cleansing and conditioning. I only need to use the shampoo typically once a week. Also, a little goes a long way. I squeeze about the size of a quarter in the palm of my hand. My hair is considered long as it goes past my shoulders. FYI, I have received no products for my review. If you want to try the products head to the company website and you can order sample packets. They offer free shipping for the samples. If you like the products and have a prime account with Amazon it is cheaper to buy with Amazon.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Curly girl friendly wash day shampoo!
Review: MopTop creates high-quality products at amazing prices in a market that is saturated with insanely priced curly girl products. I LOVE this shampoo because it is CG-friendly but I still feel CLEAN because it does have a small lather to it (some die-hards claim true CG friendly shampoos have ZERO lather, I'm not a fan of those -- makes me feel like I haven't washed my scalp) and the scent is wonderful. Will continue to use on my wash days when I don't clarify!

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: It works

This product is similar to kinky curly custard, and Camille Rose curl maker, but I find this one to be a little easier to apply & has a pleasant scent (citrus, yum!). My only complaint is that the amount is 8oz, and I wish I could find it in a 12 or 16 oz container bc I must use a lotttttttt of it. I use a hard hold over it bc it doesn't give me a ton of hold, but I always have to use a gel on top of any styler. Gel alone doesn't give me the definition I desire. THIS does!!! Highly recommend!!

Unfortunately, it had oozed out of the jar despite being wrapped in bubble wrap because there was no seal on the inside of the product.  It makes me concerned about the product integrity.  Not sure if I'll order again based on that, and that bums me out.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Lesser known holy grail product
Review: I'm a big fan of this stuff. It's my favorite gel for my 3a(ish) hair. I use it in combination with a curl cream, because my hair is thick and needs a lot of moisture, but this product can be a one-step curl routine for finer hair. I like it better than Deva Curl gel. It has better hold and does some special slip action that is very moisturizing and unique to the product. I also like the way it sculpts my curls a little bit more than the Deva gels. I love the definition I get from this product. Although you use a generous amount, I wouldn't load it on too thick, because it is fairly strong. You need to be kind of sparing when reapplying on second day hair--I would recommend not reapplying to the whole head. My only criticism is that it can create slightly more buildup than other lighter gels, like Deva. The smell is citrusy and lovely. The ingredients are VERY clean. Buy, buy, buy.

Title: I've tried everything and this is GREAT

This custard leaves my hair soft and gives me defined curls to even the most stubborn strands of hair that just look frizzy. I typically laugh at products that claim you need a quarter sized amount - that's such a load of garbage for anyone with longer, thick hair. But this stuff....you do not need a lot to go along way! This custard has replaced 2 other products that I no longer need in my routine. I'm super happy so far!!!!!!!!!

It adds great definition to your curls and it is very forgiving if you use too much. If you like soft touch hold with defined curls, then this is for you. I actually combine it with another gel. I first use it on really damp hair as a "primer" and then finish off with the devacurl arc angel ultra hold gel. I don't have to use nearly as much devacurl gel and the combination of both products give me great definition. I will be purchasing it again.

Title: Not quite right for my hair
Review: This stuff smells amazing, but it's just too heavy for my fine 2b/c curls. I have thin, porous hair, and this custard makes it pretty weighed down and icky. Though if I scrunch enough after it seems to look sort of OK.That being said, I think it could work really well for someone with thicker hair and a different curl texture. Instead, I'm just trying to use it up by applying to the bottom layer of my hair and using something else on the top. If you have curls like mine, I highly recommend AG Hair Cosmetics Curl Trigger Defining Spray. It's a little pricy but so great at forming curls without weighing them down.

Title: Caution - PHENOXYETHANOL
Review: I have been searching and searching for a curl cream that doesn't contain any unsafe toxic ingredient. I got excited about this one until I came to "PHENOXYETHANOL". It is commonly used in just about every cosmetics as a replacement for parabens but there are studies linking it to adverse effects. For those of you interested in as less toxicity as possible you may want to consider and Google for the info

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: really nice products for dry hair...
Review: I don't have dry hair or course hair, my hair is baby fine and too soft, so these products are too heavy for my hair.Thankfully, I only bought a sample pack from her website, so I didn't spend $$ on something that I would not use.I recommend the sample for those of you who are not sure about this product for your hair. The shampoo was too moisturizing for my hair and the conditioner was ridiculously too oily for my hair. I had a film of oil on my hair and mybody after I tried rinsing it out, so I had to go back and rewash with my regular shampoo. I do not recommend this forsoft fine hair, but I think it would be great for course dry hair.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Made my scalp itchy and flakey
Review: I really wanted to like this shampoo because I love this brand, but unfortunately, this product did not work for me. The very first time I washed with this shampoo, I noticed that large sections of my scalp were covered in flaking skin. This was mostly an issue around my crown and forehead area. It was the strangest thing; the flaking would begin immediately after use (noticeable even under wet hair) and continue to get worse for the day or two after washing. After the hair dried, it would begin to itch and continue to get itchier as time passed. I'm not sure if it was just dry flaky skin or if it was actual dandruff, but the amount of whatever it was was astonishing (and gross).I stopped using the shampoo after about a week, and my problems stopped then, but I've used it a couple of times since (when I was desperate and out of other shampoos) and had the same problem. It's super weird but I haven't heard of anyone else having the same issue. Other than that, it smelled good and did a fine job washing my actual hair, but I just wanted to put this out there in case anyone else experiences something similar.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Awesome so far!!
Review: I have been following the curly girl method for 5 months and have been experimenting with different products and different ways to apply them.  I received a sample of this custard and I love it so far! It made my 2C/3A curls even more curly!  I use a denman brush when I wash my hair, then I scrunch this into wet hair on top of homemade flax seed gel.  I only used a nickel sized amount on my thin hair which is just past my shoulders.  My curls were popping like never before!  It does have glycerin but it's winter now so it works great 4 me.  Not sure how well it will work in the humid summer because of the glycerin.I see some reviewers complained about this gel making their hair crunchy but keep in mind you're supposed to scrunch the hardness out of your hair in order to get soft curls.  Other reviewers complained of flaking but this wasn't an issue for me as i used on wet hair and did not mess with my curls after they dried and I "scrunched out the crunch".  Maybe "scrunching out the crunch" with some light oil would help with that?  Anyway, I give this stuff 2 thumbs up!

Title: Why the fragrance?
Review: I won't be buying this product or any other hair product with fragrance.  I am extremely chemically sensitive and believe me these hair oils use chemical fragrance.  Why bother with "organic" etc etc if you're going to add a strong chemical for the fragrance?  I don't get it.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: It's alright but better products out there for cheaper
Review: This product smells really nice, like limes.  It feels like that sugar body scrub you use.  I put some on my damp hair.  It will hold some of the curl in, but when it dries it turns hard like glue then starts to flake.  Compared to Ampro gel, which is much cheaper, I like Ampro better.  Ampro will smooth out my hair and make it straighter as it is holding it down.  Plus when it dries, it is not hard as glue, comes out easy and does not damage hair.  Ampro does very little flaking as well.  Back to that,

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: I diluted this....
Review: I have very fine hair, so products will weigh it down easily.  I tried this several times and it was way too heavy for my hair. So, I got the idea of diluting a little with water, so that I could put it in a squeeze bottle and apply to my hair. It works great. My curls look as good with this product as any other curl enhancer that I have used.  I use a few pumps of deva curl ultra defining gel on top.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: PHOTOGRAPHERS are "Fans" of MopTop too!
Review: I had the Great and Unexpected pleasure of meeting the makers of MopTop at the Natural Expo in March in which I was photographing- What a joy! I used the products and they ACTUALLY WORK! I literally saw my course coils and for the first time, loved them! Next time, I will use a mixture of Custard and the Medium Hold Gel for more define twists in my Twist-Out...Everyone says by hair looks Great!I personally like that my hair has retained it's moisture as never before, Wow. The smell of the products are amazing and like you instructed at the Expo, a Dab will do ya! It seemed I was squirting a lot in my hand but looking at the remainder in the bottles, Nope!I would literally do a photo shoot for Mop Top. Ha! There's nothing like being apart of a product that you actual believe in!Again, Thank you for introducing me to the MopTop products to try. As someone who does Not manage my own "natural" coils and frequents "the shop" regularly, you have made a Believer out of me. Thank you for this new "discovery"!!adamsvillephotography@gmail.com

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.
Title: Not impressed

Title: This conditioner is pretty good. It glides through my curly hair nicely
Review: This conditioner is pretty good. It glides through my curly hair nicely, and helps keep the curl controlled as my hair dries.  Does not make my hair frizzy.  It smells nice, sweet like some kind of candy.  The reason for 2 stars is the bottle it comes in.  The product itself is pretty thick, like pudding.  It does not flow.  The plastic bottle it's in is thick hard plastic. It's ridiculously difficult to squeeze a thick, pudding-like product out of a narrow-necked stiff plastic bottle.  If you take the cap off you can "shake" it out, which is what I do, but it's not ideal considering that sometimes it shakes out a huge glob bigger than you need, which is a hassle again to scrape the excess back in.  The directions for use on the bottle state in bold letters, "shake well".  Lol, how do you shake this product well, especially when the bottle is brand new and filled to the top, and for what purpose?  Does the product separate as it sits it something.  No.  I just think there must be a lot of people in the company who don't understand the product or use it themselves.  The product would be better contained in a jar with a lid that you can dip your fingers into, or maybe a soft squeezable tube that can be stored upside down.  I wouldn't buy it again.  It doesn't seem like the manufacturer understands its own product. It's not exactly a bargain price either.

Product: MopTop Curly Hair Custard Gel for Fine, Thick, Wavy, Curly & Kinky-Coily Natural hair, Anti Frizz Curl Moisturizer, Definer & Lightweight Curl Activator w/ Aloe, great for Dry Hair, 8oz.

I love this product...only stuff I use...I dread the day I run out...now I won't.

Title: Surprising Good!
Review: I bought these products after winning the travel sized kit and loving the daily conditioner.  I like the gentle shampoo because it cleaned my hair without stripping all the natural oils.  The deep conditioner didn't give me the same kind of slip for detangling as the the daily conditioner, but it did what it said it would do.  The leave it in conditioner gave my hair a light hold like a gel without the crunchy hardness of a gel.  It also left my hair soft and smooth.  I will for sure buy the leave it in conditioner and the gentle shampoo again.  I gave this review a 4 not 5 stars because the deep conditioner doesn't have the same slip as the daily conditioner.  The daily conditioner is the best conditioner for slip I have every used.  If you have frizzy curly hair these products are awesome.  It costs more, but these products are very high in and they work.  I have kinky curly hair and I love these products.  BTW it your hair is protein sensitive don't use the deep conditioner more then once a week.

Title: Caution!
Review: Let me start by saying I love this product. However, it has no preservatives in it and can actually ‚Äúgo bad‚Äù if it sits to long. I usually get it from my hair salon, but found it here on amazon and decided to order it. When it arrived, the tubs were wrapped in additional plastic (which is different from the salon) and the safety seal was missing. The thing that bothered me though was the color, consistency and smell of the product. It is supposed to smell wonderful (somewhat sweet but not overpowering) with a light opal color the consistency of thick honey. This was fowl smelling, runny and darker than it was supposed to be. Long story long, great product but buy it at a store so you can check it‚Äôs color!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Staple product, consistent results.
Review: This is one of my staple products. I have 2B, low porosity, fine-medium strands, high density hair. This custard smells great and is very concentrated, ensure you emulsify well when applying.  Custards don‚Äôt typically provide a lot of hold but I do think this product has a good amount of hold on its own. I typically use it on wash days but have used it to refresh and it will revive and hold my waves. Product smells great, citrusy like a Kumquat but the smell unfortunately will not linger (I personally would love to smell like this product all day long). The product does contain protein and glycerin. It has held up well even in humidity despite the glycerin content. This is likely because I DO layer this product with 2 other stylers that I think are a great combination and compliment each other superbly. I use the Uncle Funky‚Äôs Daughter Curl Magic as a base, Moptop Curl Custard second, and seal the deal with Jessie Curl Spiralicious. In the pictures my hair looks wet/shiny, but it is fully dry FYI.In case you are wondering I use a cowash, As I Am 2 out of my 3 weekly wash days and clarify with Bounce Curl Clarifying Shampoo, and condition with Bounce Curl Super Smooth conditioner.I went crazy buying a bunch of products when I transitioned to embracing my natural hair, but hands down this product with the combination I mentioned above is a definite winner for my hair type. As you can see, I was so confident in my line-up that I went out to my first dressy outing sporting my natural hair for the first time since my transition and I was not disappointed. It gave me such confidence to know you can look ‚Äúput together‚Äù with wavy/textured hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: great custard
Review: This is indeed a great custard, better than the other super famous custard, Kinky Curly. With moptop hair dries faster, I get better definition and glossy clumps. My hair is 2c, fine but dense, dry, heavily highlighted. I really get beautiful results. It is pretty forgiving, as if you use too much, you can easily scrunch out the cast and it won't weight your hair down a bit...this is another big difference with kinky curly...with my hair type it is pretty much impossible to get volume with kinky curly custard, but I get ton of body with lots of movement with moptop custard. The only con is the high content of glycerin that causes frizz in the super humid, high dew points days we have here in Florida. In those days, I can't usually use moptop by itself as a solo styler, but I need to top it with a hard hold-no/low glycerin gel (great with AG liquid effects, or Biosilk hard rock gelee). Not a big deal, I still get the good definition and bounciness moptop gives.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Great healthy gel alternative
Review: This custard is more like a light hold gel for wash and go days. I have wavy frizzy hair and this left my hair with almost totally frizz free, soft, bouncy curls. It definitely has a funky slimy texture with a strong fruity citrus smell but the smell dissipates as it dries.Pros:Adds shineSoft not crunchy curlsLightweightNatural ingredientsAffordableCons:Tames most frizz but not allOverall I am pleased to have this on hand. It is a much better alternative to the unhealthy ingredients I got from my previous gel. Still looking for something natural to completely tame my frizz without looking like a grease ball.UPDATE: After a few months of use I found that if I use a little more on top where I'm most prone to get frizz it will make a slight cast that I can break after it dries and then I'm frizz free! I just pull the locks through my fingers to unstiffen it until it looks natural.I'm also so impressed with how much volume I get with this. It doesn't weigh down my hair even though I add extra on top. Updating my rating to 5 stars. I use it daily after showering or to refresh curls. I still have plenty left. I'd guess with my medium length hair it will last at least 6 months. Great natural product and value!

Title: Leaves a white flaky residue

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Blame it on the a-a-a-a-a-aloe
Review: I wanted to love this gel, I really did, but it's just not for me. It smells amazing and it has this really interesting thin consistency that seems perfect for not weighing down my curls.And yet, here I am, the fourth wash day using this product, and I have conceded defeat. I kept getting fuzzy, frizzy, stringy, undefined curls and I could not for the life of me figure out why. Turns out, aloe is a problem for a lot of curlies. If your hair is instantly frizzing and losing it's "clumpage" when you add this gel, consider that your hair might not like aloe. Look up flash-drying.I don't want to give this product a bad rating just because I didn't know aloe wouldn't work with my hair. After all, it seems to work well for lots of people! I just hope this review helps someone else who is struggling with this gel and can't figure out why.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: My new favorite
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†This stuff is my new go-to! Wish i found it sooner.I‚Äôve never been quite sure what the difference between gel and custard/jelly is ‚Äî there are so many different types of products out there! But in my experience I‚Äôve found custards and jellys to clump my hair nicely but not necessarily define them, and I‚Äôve found them to leave my hair looking a little greasy and leaving a weird residue on them, whereas I‚Äôve found gels to define and hold hair much better, but often leave it crunchy with lots of flyaways. Also, gels hold seems to be too strong and leaves a lot of my waves/curls misshapen. This product has a unique texture, not 100% like either gel or jelly (see video)My hair ranges from ‚Äòs‚Äô wave patterns to curls (mostly underneath.) The top is prone to extreme frizziness and just general ‚Äúpoof‚Äù and the front pieces that frame my face are prone to losing all wave pattern. This product seems to address all my hair concerns: manages frizz, boosts curl patterns where it‚Äôs needed, and holds pretty well without leaving a weird greasy residue.Overall I‚Äôd say this product is the perfect medium between jelly and gel! More hold than a jelly but less crunch than a gel. It smells great too and i like that it comes in a jar. I use a leave in conditioner/curl cream first and then use this product to scrunch my hair, let it dry, and I‚Äôm good to go.Hope this product helps someone struggling with their hair as much as it helped me! For the price you can‚Äôt go wrong giving it a chance‚Äî I‚Äôm so glad i did :)

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Yes! Great for curly, frizzy, wavy hair in any humidity
Review: This stuff is great! It smells slightly citrusy but not sweet, a little like baby aspirin, lol, but the smell is nice and is not strong. The texture is hard to describe - it is thick and maybe best described like "slime" but not slimy. It is thick and luxurious. You will only need a little to apply to your hair; I have long, thick hair, and I use about two quarter size blobs. Run through wet or damp hair and comb through, fluff your curls and then leave your hair alone. You will find that your curls are well defined, moist, and not frizzy at all. The product can be a little stiff, but if you shake your hair out, the stiffness goes away. There is absolutely no flaking at all with this product. I am also allergic to a lot of gels and mousses (the perfumes cause scalp problems), but I have no problems with this product at all. I'm picky with hair products, and I've tried a million of them. I will buy this one again!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Life Changing Shampoo!!
Review: This is the second or third sulfate-free shampoo that I've ever tried and I love it! I have wavy 2b hair, and ever since using this product I've noticed such a change in its texture and shine. I can go longer between wash days, which in turn means my hair is looking a lot healthier and shinier. My main concern when first buying this was that it wouldn't lather as well or that my hair wouldn't be as clean and I am so happy I was wrong. The lather is a little less voluminous than your standard bottle of shampoo but it will still keep your hair very clean without making it feel like straw. Aside from all of this, a major highlight of this shampoo is the bamboo scent. I have been asked by three to four people about this shampoo because of the smell alone.  The only gripe I have is that it doesn't come in a bigger size ( please make a 16 oz. version!!). Highly recommend!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Suitable for fine hair
Review: I have fine, wavy hair and most leave in conditioners don't work for me. Liquids are too light and don't offer enough slip, and creams are too heavy and leave my waves/curls weighed down. This one is just right! It looks like a thick cream but it goes on very light. I apply it from my ears down and it leaves me with bouncy, moist curls. I adore the bamboo essence scent, which is very light and fresh with a slight citrus smell to it.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: I absolutely LOVE this product
Review: I absolutely LOVE this product!!!  I use this over the Shea Moisture Miracle Leave In Styler and I get the most beautiful results.  It leaves my hair soft, shiny and does really well in humid weather.  And you cant beat the price.  I was using DevaCurls Ultra Defining gel for a while but that would leave my hair looking extra dry on day 2 and 3 hair.  With the MopTop my hair looks and feels great for days without needing much refreshing.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Glycerin again!!
Review: Why do companies insist on using this awful ingredient?? Can't use it in high humidity nor in really low humidity so it is really limited to early Spring and maybe fall, or at least it is here in the South. It is sitting in the back of my cabinet waiting on dew points to get into the correct range. Would rather buy something that can be used year round!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: It's great stuff
Review: I've tried several things over the years, from the store and salon, and I kept going back to $3 Garnier Curl Construct mousse to hold my curl pattern.  Along with Curly Girl advice, I have kept my thinning strands from frizzing (thanks Mother Nature) using that mousse and conditioning with every wash.  But I was curious to try a curly hair custard and, on a whim, bought this.  I am so glad I did. This holds my large spiral pattern as well as my old mousse, but my hair looks fuller, feels bouncier and softer.  Like there's nothing weighing it down. And on day 2, I can spritz my hair with water, scrunch, and it perks right up again.  Trying that with the Garnier left my hair looking a little flat and dirty.A small amount does the trick on my shoulder length bob, applied by scrunching it thru fairly wet strands and then carefully drying with a diffuser.  The citrus scent is nice.  The price no longer bothers me because that container is going to last me awhile and the results can't be beat.  Highly recommend!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Not the real product
Review: Not the real thing. I had previously ordered a sample packet from moptop directly and LOVED the conditioner. I ordered through amazon because I had a credit on my account. The product I received was packaged well and sealed, but the conditioner does NOT perform anything close to the sample. The real conditioner detangles my hair and has a great slip to it, what I received doesn‚Äôt help detangle at all. Super disappointed.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Perfect my fine 2B hair
Review: I bought this for my fine 2B hair, as well as my daughter who has fine straight hair. i'm very happy with it. It lathers up quite a bit!  I use it several times a week. I follow the curly girl method but  I found that co-washing is just way too much oil for my fine 2B waves so I use this shampoo (and moptop's light conditioner).  I prefer this for my daughters fine, straight hair too. I used this and the light conditioner on it and her hair is the best it's ever been..everything at the store is too heavy or left her hair staticky.  this is the perfect combo

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: The custard is the absolute best!!!
Review: This is my FAVORITE product of all the products MopTop makes!  This custard is the perfect addition to using the daily gel!  It's gives your hair even more bounce and curl.  I love love love the custard.  All of the MopTop products make my curls so much better than they were before MopTop!  I have tried so many different products and can honestly say MopTop is THE BEST!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Your hair style will last for days!
Review: I am loving Mop Top!I‚Äôve religiously used LUS for at least the past year and a half and loved it. But my curls just aren‚Äôt as full and I would have to completely re-do my hair daily if I didn‚Äôt want to just shove it in a bun. You know what I mean- totally wet it, work in fresh product, diffuse.....I have enough hair that that gets annoying.BUT with Mop Top I get out of the shower on day one and split my wet hair down the middle, over my shoulders, take a very small scoop of the goo and twist and finger brush it through each section. Then I flip my head, scrunch my hair and diffuse.I have noticed that a tiny bit of product goes a long way and it can get crunchy, but I solve that by just rolling my curls between my hands in sections to loosen the crunch and it‚Äôs perfect!Then, my favorite part about this product:I don‚Äôt wash my hair every day when I shower. I may go 3-4 days no wash. But like I said with my previous product: I would have to re-do the entire curly process if I wanted my hair done daily. NOT with Mop Top. A few sprays with a water bottle to reform the bed head (not even enough worth diffuse drying) and boom! My hair looks like day one! For all three days! No extra product! I love it!This tub of goo will last forever!The photo I‚Äôm posting is day THREE!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: My favorite sulfate free shampoo
Review: I've tried lots of sulfate free shampoos and this one is hands-down my favorite for my fine, wavy hair. It foams up great and the bamboo essence scent is divine (it's a fresh, light scent with a hint of citrus). It cleans thoroughly, but like all sulfate free shampoos, there are some tricks to helping it clean properly. You must use LOTS of water...add more water, not more product, if you feel like you need more cleaning power. Also, let it sit just a bit longer than regular shampoo. After that it will leave your hair squeaky clean, with no scalp irritation from harsh sulfates. It does not dry my hair out.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Glycerin!!
Review: This would be a great product if it didn't have glycerin. That one ingredient limits it's usefulness for those of us that live in humid climates. Talking about frizz!! Companies really need to find a different humectant that is good for humidity. This product is a little pricey to have to put back in the cabinet to wait for the dew points to get into the right range to be able to use. Live and learn.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Not what I was expecting
Review: I have naturally curly hair. I have tried so many products so when I came across this stuff I was like Yes! I need to try it. Well the first time I applied it I didn't seem to put enough in my hair (it doesn't state how much to put in your hair so it's trial and error I guess). Before I used it the next time I searched You Tube I found the creators page and watched how she applied it. Well she put on tons it seemed. My hair is about 3 inches shorter and so I tried to adjust the amount. My hair came out crunchy and nothing like hers. Then later that night my hair looked like I had dandruff and my head itched the rest of the night. I should have washed my hair that night because my scalp itched all night. I got up first thing and washed my hair really good but it still itched. I don't think I'll try it again for that reason. I can't stand my scalp itching!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Strong hold, soft curls
Review: This is my go-to gel for an awesome wash day. I've been doing the Curly Girl Method since May '18, and have used a lot of different products...but i haven't come across any better gel than this. I have 2c/3a/3b waves/curls, and this stuff helps define everything. Very strong hold (I need that for my hair) but once I "scrunch out the crunch" it leaves very soft hair.I wash my hair with Not Your Mother's curl defining shampoo and conditioner (pink bottles) and style with very wet hair. I take sections of my hair and mix together a cream and Jessicurl Spiralicious, apply to hair, and then I apply Mop Top. I brush each section with a Denman brush and smooth each section to encourage clumping. Then I scrunch the hell out of it and fix the wonky curls. I do that to every section and then diffuse until about 80% dry, and let air dry the rest of the way. I've used the rest of my products with a different gel, and definitely love the MopTop results better every time.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Best shampoo and conditioner ever, in the history of EVER!
Review: Wow, is all I can say. I recently started the curly girl method.  That aside this shampoo and conditioner are the best I have ever used in 52 years.  I didn't even know I had curly hair, just frizzy straight!  After using this little to no frizz and my hair literally feels like silk.  No joke!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Glossy, defined curls
Review: I have been using Mop Top shampoo, conditioner, leave in, mongongo oil, and custard.  I have loose spiral curls (non-processed hair).  Here‚Äôs my straight up review:  I will continue to order the shampoo which is very gentle, the conditioner which is very thick and moisturizing, and the leave in.  The mongongo oil is useless and the custard is hideous.  The custard leaves hair crispy and nasty.  Don‚Äôt waste your moneySo here‚Äôs what works for my hair:  Mop Top shampoo and conditioner with Ouidad Vitacurl gel.  Because I can‚Äôt shampoo every day, on the second day I use Mop Top leave in with the Ouidad gel.  Again, my hair is unprocessed and loose spiral.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Not Worth The Money if You Have A Lot of Hair
Review: The best thing about this is the slippage and resistance to breakage. It‚Äôs perfect for detangling wavy and curly hair. However, as someone with thick, long hair, I can‚Äôt use this any longer. The bottle is tiny and it equates to about 5-7 washes for $13. It is very lightweight so if your hair gets heavy, this is good for you. The quest continues...

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Works great!!  Never used a "custard" before, but it does great!!
Review: It is really hard to get my hair products just right for me, but this works great!!!  I started doing my hair with the curly girl method about three months ago, and it was doing better. I just couldn't find the right styling product that didn't have silicone and sulfate in it.  I was recommended to try this, but I couldn't find it in the local stores.  I purchased on Amazon, and it does work for my hair.  Makes it more curly and not all frizzy.  I don't have to use that much either, so this will last a good amount of time.  I do only wash twice a week though.  I just wish this wasn't so expensive, but I am willing to pay this being as it is so hard for me to find the right styling products for my hair!!UPDATE:  This worked great in the winter months but not doing all that good in the summer being as it has glycerin in this.  I have high porosity hair so will only be able to use this in cold weather.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Perfect for fine hair.
Review: I used the Deva curl gel for a few years, until it completely dried out my hair. That is when I discovered that I have low porosity hair, and that the Deva curl gel is full of protein, which is not good for low porosity hair So, I went looking for something with minimal protein and found the Mop Top curly hair custard. I wasn't expecting much, because there are no curl holding chemicals in this gel, but I was very surprised to see that my hair was both fluffy and curly after just one little scoop (3 fingers) of gel. With Mop Top, less is more, so you don't need much. To refresh second day curls, just put a dash of gel and leave in conditioner in a small spray bottle with water. Spray and scrunch, and your curls will hold another day or two, even on fine hair. What I like the most is that this product never weighs down your hair. And it smells citrusy, which I like a lot.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: I Love This Shampoo!
Review: I started the Curly/Wavy Girl Method and tried several "low-poos", but they were too watery and didn't cleanse my hair. Then I tried a MopTop sample kit and loved this shampoo and conditioner. The shampoo has the perfect consistency - not too thick but not too watery. For a low-poo it sudses up amazingly, and is easy to scrub into my scalp. I can tell it doesn't cleanse my scalp as well as my clarifying shampoo, but that is to be expected. I will use it 3 out of 4 washes to encourage the natural oils in my hair. It has a great balance of protein vs. moisture. And best of all is the scent - I didn't know bamboo could smell so good! It is an addicting sweet/fresh scent that makes me really look forward to wash days. Which says a lot, as I am usually very sensitive to fragrances and there are many hair products I have to toss because the scents really bother me. I'm loving my journey with MopTop!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Keeping hair nice and soft, gentle shampoo
Review: I got this because I was going to try out the curly girl method, which I found out isn‚Äôt for me but I still like this shampoo. I try to not wash my hair every day but I live in Florida, and exercise most days so i feel like to feel fresh I do need to wash my hair almost daily, and this shampoo doesn‚Äôt dry it out. I use a minuscule amount, spread around in my hands and just wash roots. Works well for my mid length dry at ends but easily greasy roots - hair üëåüèº

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: A Great Conditioner
Review: I started the Curly Girl Method and heard a YouTuber rave about MopTop. I tried the sample pack and instantly fell in love. The shampoo and conditioner are very moisturizing while containing a good balance of protein. The consistency is perfect - not too thick but not too watery. The conditioner provides just the right amount of "slick" feel and makes my hair easy to brush. My hair feels well conditioned. But the best is the scent - who know bamboo could smell so good?? It is hard to describe, but it is a sweet, fresh scent that makes me look forward to wash days - and I'm usually intolerant to most scents. Definitely recommend.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Can't get any better than this for us curly girls
Review: Can't get any better than this for us curly girls. I've been buying this for years and will never ever try anything different! I've tried everything under the sun. Combine this with the daily conditioner, and shampoo, and one other product I use and the curls are amazing. I get compliments every day.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: The best!
Review: This is my holy-grail product. For me, it creates soft, non-crunchy, non-sticky curls when scrunched and diffused or plopped. There is no heavy residue, very little to no frizz. It seems moisturizing and well as light hold. Just love it. (FYI, I have 2b-2c waves, not sure of porosity but probably low to medium).

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: I'm A Believer!
Review: During quarantine, like many others, I discovered that my hair was a lot curlier than I imagined! In the course of integrating the Curly Girl method/products, this stuck out as one that helped other low-porosity people. I didn't notice a difference at first, but now that I've experimented with a lot of different products, this one is still part of my wash day routine. I add this right after leave-in and just before I apply a hard cast gel; I can literally feel it sucking the water into the core of my strands, and it takes my hair from dripping to just saturated with one application. Once all three products are applied, I throw my hair up into a microfiber turban until I can diffuse (for anyone that was curious about my post-wash routine). Hope this helps other low-porosity curlies out there!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Switched from Deva to MopTop
Review: I really was just trying to save some money after using DevaCurl products for a couple of years. Deva is great, but it's really expensive, plus you should change up your product occasionally to give your hair a rest.I shopped around, checked reviews, even tried some samples of a few brands, and MopTop products won the race by a mile! I'm currently using the no-poo cleansing conditioner, the daily conditioner, the leave-in conditioner, and the Curly Hair Custard. The custard was my first purchase and came with some samples from the rest of the line.I will say it works much better with a little extra moisture underneath. After conditioning (or cleansing and conditioning if it's "wash" day) I apply a tiny bit of the leave-in while still in the shower with SOAKING wet hair. Then I step out and apply a liberal amount of the Curly Custard, being sure to flip upside-down and side-to-side. Then scrunch scrunch scrunch. I let it air dry then loosen the cast once it's completely dry. This can also be done with a diffuser, but I don't have time for blow dryers. I find I see a lot more frizz if I skip the leave-in.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Curly-girl life changer!
Review: My hairstylist recommended this product and it‚Äôs been a life changer!!! My curlyish hair has most often been noncommittal towards performing in my daily hopes before this. Every night before bed I simply re-wet the ends of my hair, saturate it with Mop Top and go to bed. The wonderful fragrance is such a plus!  I wake up EVERY morning with perfect, ready to go hair! My hair feels soft and the curls are perfect. Throughout the day if I need a reboot ( swimming, shower any hair adventure), I just rewet my ends again, apply Mop Top and go! It drys quickly and no extra fussing is needed! BUY IT!!!!‚ú®

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Just Okay
Review: This was just okay for me. Didn't provide any better results than lesser expensive products I can buy at my local retail outlet. I bought this because it is natural and minus the sulfates, which can dry out and damage hair and scalp. My scalp has been dry for some time and I have psoriasis, which does flare up from time to time., especially when my scalp is dry. I also changed shampoos at the same time, using a cleansing conditoner free of sulfates.I've been using it for a couple of weeks now and it hasn't really made a difference. Additonally, it tends to create a slightly crispy texture in my hair.  This will probably not be the experience for most people as I have very, very kinky, frizzy curly hair. Although each folicle is very fine, I have a lot of it, and WITH the extreme curl, it often feels almost coarse.I am Scotch Irish and just have crazier hair than most people here buying this product. However, if you share my genetic predisposition, please understand that this may not work for you either.That all being said, the product came well packaged and smells really nice. And I do like that it is natural. *sigh*

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Don't waste your money. This hurt my hair, and made it more frizzy.
Review: The smell is nice, and that is it. I have curly, fine hair, ringlets. This product I put on wet hair in the shower after the terrible Moptop Shampoo (which made my hair feel like straw). There was no moisture added. No detangling. Afterward I used Moptop Curly Custard, which is the only thing that added any moisture. I do NOT recommend this product, nor the shampoo. Anywhere I didn't but the custard (because it weighs down my fine hair around scalp was a frizz show)

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Defines curls, but made my hair stringy
Review: I have 2C/3A wavy/curly hair. I used this in combination with the entire line of Mop Top products: the gentle shampoo, daily conditioner and leave-in conditioner. First, a little goes a long way. Beware of using too much. However, I tried using varying amounts on numerous occasions, and every time, it defined my curls but made my hair stringy. I did not like the look. I think this product may just be too heavy for me. Also, second day hair was frizzy and felt dry. Unfortunately, I missed the return cutoff and am stuck with this expensive product I can't use. Just didn't work for me.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: DO NOT BUY: Broken seal with mold/object inside
Review: Upon receiving my item I noticed dried product on the outside of the lid. I have a photo but the app only lets me post one. When I opened the package the seal was already broken. A lot of the product was dried along the rim of the container. Upon closer inspection I noticed two black/green spots imbedded into the product. I assume this is mold or dirt. I cannot believe I paid such a high price for a defective, dried, dirty, and unsealed product. Will not be purchasing from this supplier again.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Great for fine, low porosity, dry, 2A-B-C hair!
Review: This product has been superior compared to many other products I have tried for my wavy, fine, low porosity, medium density, shoulder length shag style hair that suffers from dryness, halo frizz and a mixed curl pattern. 6 months ago I decided to fully embrace my natural waves, use a slightly modified version of the CGM, and found that the front of my hair is 2C, the sides of my hair are 2B, and the back of my hair is 1C-2A. Research suggested that hair similar to mine benefits most from lightweight, moisturizing products. I ended up focusing more on using a lower number of moisturizing products instead of multiple lightweight products. I've used As I Am Leave In Conditioner for my dry hair since before I started this hair journey but decided to ditch it if I'm going to add on a curl activator/enhancer/gel. I tried Cantu Curl Activator, which did almost nothing to define my waves and made my hair more frizzy. I tried Maui Moisture Curl Smoothie which did help enhance my waves (not in the back though), provided decent moisture, reduced some frizz, but did not have much hold- next day waves were basically not a thing and frizz was back. Adding in Curls Blueberry Bliss Gel gave me almost no hold (Upon purchasing I didn't realize it was a light hold gel) and was very drying so I ditched that quickly and replaced it with Eco Style Gel (strong hold gel). It did help with definition and hold all around, not drying, but it wasn't optimal. I moved on to Aunt Jackie's Defining Curl Custard and no gel which impressed me with the moisture, decent hold, reduced frizz, and enhanced definition even in the 2A back of my hair- but it contains silicones that I knew would eventually weigh down my hair. Mop Top Curly Hair Custard Gel had been on my list of CGM approved products to try and I should've gone with it ages ago because this product goes beyond Aunt Jackie's. I have defined waves all around, equal hold, and it is moisturizing. I've gotten the best defined next day waves compared to all other products I've tried. With other/no products, my halo frizz is usually worse the second and third day- but even with humectants being predominant in this product, I have had no halo frizz. I usually get frizz in both dry and humid environments, I have not yet had a chance to test it on a sufficiently humid day. I am optimistic though.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

Putting this in my hair and scrunching some before it dried gave me some wave. It‚Äôs a really light hold, no crunch and it doesn‚Äôt feel like I have any product build up. Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Wow!  Finally a good hair curl product!!!
Review: When I was younger I had super straight hair.  Seriously!  Sometimes I had to perm it twice (it was the 80's when spiral perms were "in") just to get the curls to stick.  Over the years my hair has evolved and it has slowly developed major frizz.  However, recently I've discovered that when tamed, that frizz is actually waves/curls!  I've purchased some creams and mousses recently to make the most out of my curls, but all of the products I've tried have always resulted in tacky-to-the-touch, frizzy and crunchy stiff hair.  I watched a couple of YouTube videos and some of the ladies raved about this product and their curls did look lovely so I thought I'd by a jar and give it a try.  My jar arrived today and tonight I tried it.  It's AMAZING!!!  I towel dried my hair and applied this product to my damp hair.  This "custard" is runny but a little goes a long way so it didn't take much to cover my thin/fine hair.  I loved that it wasn't tacky and cause my hair to stick to my hand when I applied it.  I let my hair air-dry and I was happy to see that every time I checked on it, my curls were curling and there wasn't any frizz in sight!  When my hair was about  75% dry, I decided to defuse it and really give it the frizz test.  Once again... no frizz and my curls were even more prominent!  I've been disappointed by so many products over the years so I am so incredibly happy to find a hair product that surpassed my expectations!  I'm new to MopTop hair products but I'll definitely be giving other MopTop products a try in the future.I highly recommend this product.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

If I stick with this and the MopTop shampoo, I get a ton of buildup and my hair just looks and feels gross.I do have very hard water, so if yours is soft, you might have better results, but I'll be looking for something else.

Save your money if you have kinky coarse textured hair as this will not be enough for you. If you have fine hair and are type 3 and above will probably work great for you.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

It took me a few episodes to understand what was causing that pain a day later after the wash. Stopped using a product and the pain did not come back. Never buying any of Moptop products again!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Works

I decided to give their leave-in Conditioner a try as I do still get the flyaway frizzy stuff especially in humid weather . I have to admit that it feels strange when first applying to my hair , and I initially thought this would turn out to  be too heavy for my fine , slightly wavy hair , however after drying ( I only partially blow dry , I don't have enough time to be bothered with a full blow dry ) my hair isn't weighed down , it doesn't look greasy , it's shiny , smells good and it's soft . The frizzies are reduced to almost non existent . You don't need to use a lot of this either , my hair is half way down my back and it's fairly thick , I only use an amount that would equal maybe 2 nickels stacked on my palm and it does the job .

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

It renews with water in the morning. Plus, my head never gets itchy and there‚Äôs no build up of product on my hair or scalp. I‚Äôm using it with other brands of sulfate and paraben free shampoo and conditioner, but when I run out, I‚Äôm curious to try other MopTop products! Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Nice!

But the humidity is now at a point here in Georgia that I can‚Äôt wear it straight even with anti-humidity hairspray. Thankfully Kinky Curly was out of stock. I washed my hair and applied Moptop and went outside in the hot sun and did yardwork. Sweating profusely. Most of my hair dried though! I pulled and stretched out the curls and still have good definition. Going out for a walk with temp still 86f. Will see how good of a hold I keep. That is always a challenge for me though. End of day my curls have lost a lot of definition. I have super fine non porous bi racial hair and have to scrunch my hair to get curls and use tangle teaser too, to help bring out my curls. Very pleased

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

An hour after application, my hair looks like a frazzled mess that hasn't been conditioned in ages. The weird chemical smell lingers and is pretty unbearable, too. Hair feels somehow both dry and greasy (!) to the touch.I have wavy 2b/2c hair and this might work for other types, even though this type of product usually works quite well for me, so I really just think it's this particular brand.I see other reviews saying that the product sold on Amazon might have gone bad or is not comparable to the product you can buy elsewhere. Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

I do have to top it off with another product for additional hold but that doesn't bother me...this stuff is holy grail for me.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

Plopped my hair up in terry turban, while completing other tasks worth about 5-7 minutes. Removed towel and clipped roots up.  Once dry enough, removed clips.  My hair looked so good all work day.  Left a light gel cast, similar to Devacurl gel, until I manually loosened them up.  Then the hair was soft and even more shiny.  This product is a must if you have over dry curls.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)

Decent amount of hold but more difficult to completely break the cast than Kinky Curly custard. Does have a lot of glycerin in it so it is not good in the summer humidity. My normally minimally frizzy 2b wavy hair looked poodle-esk after only a few minutes out air conditioning. I also had some white flaking as it apparently interacts with Miss Jessie‚Äôs  curl cream.Overall it‚Äôs an okay purchase if it‚Äôs not humid outside and I‚Äôm in a hurry to leave the house with dry hair. Let me remind you, I used this for 3 months, not changing any other products and this conditioner made my hair greasy, stringy, and smelling like a literal child covered in playdough. Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Works great on small child

Title: Best hair product I have ever tried!

I made my mom try it (who never does anything with her hair) and it made her hair so much healthier looking... and brought the curls out so nicely! My niece, who is mixed, tried it... and she loved it as well! So pretty much... it doesn't matter how curly your hair is, or what nationality you are... try this! No regrets!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Not Bad
Review: I didn't dislike this product, I'm just finding that I don't like this kind of consistency much. I've tried other custards and a flaxseed gel with the same consistency and it just isn't my thing. I have fine hair, and used this at the beginning of my CG transistion, so it was kind of a 2a-2b wave. The product was nice for a wash-and-wear, one product look. It also smells like Sprite to me, which is a pleasant and not over powering smell. Unlike some custards, it didn't make my hair look stringy if I used a little too much. I gave what I had left to a friend with coarser, 3b-3c hair and she likes it as a wash-and-wear as well.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Great moisture without the weight
Review: I chose this light conditioner to try out on my daughters fine, straight hair, and also wanted something lighter for my fine 2B waves. I really like it for both of our hair. It actually leaves my daughter's fine hair kind of plumped. If you leave it in awhile, it deeply moisturizes and feels almost like buttery smooth. Yet still is so light, unlike butters and oils that weigh hair down.  It's keeping my 2B waves much more bouncy as oppose to some of the heavier butter like cowashing I did in the past. With Deva, I combine several different products to get good hold. This one does it all by itself. I‚Äôm very pleased so far.

This product is not heavy, is not crunchy, and provides some volume with zero frizz. It can be used on its own for curl and medium hold or under a gel as just a curl activator. New holy grail‚ÄîI keep trying other things, and they don‚Äôt come close. I was not paid for this review.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Curl Enhancer Gel, Reduces Frizz, Natural Ingredients, Kinky-Coily Curly Hair Gel, Made w/ ÔªøAloe, Sea Botanicals & Honey, (ÔªøCitrus Medley, 8oz)
Title: Works great
